FYI @OpenSkywalking/pmc @OpenSkywalking/committer-team , this will be merged when the 3.3 iteration begins. So make sure this is good enough for you.

Great!
Java agent plugin management mechanism is very important for  flexible expansion and friendly use!
I think even  can configure what plugins I need when I'm packaged according maven. HAHA!
"The priority flow is env > properties > agent.config file" is good!
I think if read from env, maybe a json format parameter is enough instead of many parameters!
Thank you !

> I think if read from env, maybe a json format parameter is enough instead of many parameters!

@IluckySi Interesting point. Maybe after this is merged, you can send a pull request to implement your point. I will be glad to see that. The two ways from system env are my expected.
OK!

> Provide sharding jdbc as storage

Glad to know this from dangdang tech team. Hope this can be provided in Skywalking 3.3.x . If you need any help, you can call anyone from @OpenSkywalking/pmc and @hanahmily .
See #520 for codes.

The Skywalking targets Cloud Native Java Stack. So Spring Cloud and Microservice architecture, or other language agents. So ejb is not our primary goals.

**But, A Big BUT**, my design of Java agent should work in other middlewares, such as weblogic. If you have any problem, we can discuss that. And since we have supported SpringMVC and Struts, even don't have the Weblogic plugin, you application is able to be instrumented as well.

EJB is truely not supported yet. But if you are interested, it would be hard to develop a new plugin, and we welcome your contribution. I assume you are a Chinese, you can check the zh-doc for plugin development: https://github.com/OpenSkywalking/skywalking/wiki/Plugin-Development-Guide

Hope this helps you.
ok  thank you. i will try to use Skywalking  with SpringMVC  plugin .

1、是基于什么考虑，把jdbc监控修改了
2、插件包现在放在外面了，是方便增减，都实际部署时感觉集成至一个jar包更方便，纠结了

@neeuq 我还不是很确定，你描述的场景。`Config.Logging.DIR`只应该在初始阶段修改，后续不应该有人修改。你所描述的多线程场景在什么地方发生呢？

> 1、是基于什么考虑，把jdbc监控修改了

主要解决的是这种连接校验的问题。除了Druid之外，有些datasource也监测这个。

> 2、插件包现在放在外面了，是方便增减，都实际部署时感觉集成至一个jar包更方便，纠结了

这个我个人认为，增减是主要特性，你只是多了一个`tar`的操作，我觉得没有必要纠结。

另外，因为此问题已解决，我将关闭此问题。
@jameskypee 是否能提供更进一步的信息？我将保留此问题48小时，之后将关闭。

```
2017-10-26 17:33:12,423 - org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.RemoteWorkerRef -398406 [Thread-20] ERROR [] - null
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.remote.grpc.proto.RemoteData$Builder.addDataStrings(RemoteData.java:1244) ~[apm-collector-remote-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.storage.define.noderef.NodeReferenceDataDefine.serialize(NodeReferenceDataDefine.java:74) ~[apm-collector-storage-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.RemoteWorkerRef.tell(RemoteWorkerRef.java:65) ~[apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.WorkerRefs.tell(WorkerRefs.java:55) ~[apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.impl.AggregationWorker.lambda$sendToNext$0(AggregationWorker.java:82) ~[apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.forEach(ConcurrentHashMap.java:1597) [?:1.8.0_144]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.impl.AggregationWorker.sendToNext(AggregationWorker.java:79) [apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.impl.AggregationWorker.onWork(AggregationWorker.java:56) [apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.stream.worker.AbstractWorker.execute(AbstractWorker.java:43) [apm-collector-stream-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
        at org.skywalking.apm.collector.queue.disruptor.DisruptorEventHandler.onEvent(DisruptorEventHandler.java:59) [apm-collector-queue-3.2.3-2017.jar:?]
```

Edit by @wu-sheng, format the error logs.

见org.skywalking.apm.agent.core.conf.SnifferConfigInitializer.initialize()方法
configFileStream = loadConfigFromAgentFolder()方法里面：加载AGENT_PACKAGE_PATH
接下来才调用
ConfigInitializer.initialize代码处：加载Config
这期间Config.Logging.DIR从：空 --> AGENT_PACKAGE_PATH -->配置的路径的转换

假设中间每个阶段都写一条日志，FileWriter是基于Config.Logging.DIR创建文件流，一旦确认文件是
在AGENT_PACKAGE_PATH下，后续对Config.Logging.DIR的修改就无效的。

这个问题跟是否多线程关系不大，不管日志同步或异步写都会
Config.Logging.DIR一旦通过env, properties或者config文件制定，根据AGENT_PACKAGE_PATH来生成日志的逻辑，将会失效。这是目前的设计策略。

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13916141/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13916141)

Coverage decreased (-0.0009%) to 17.71% when pulling **ff5107d1368ae719131effd9d0ae2df6dc61d2e1 on ascrutae:fix/spring-plugin** into **a5b5440274231a39b6a3831087402d20ef5274d5 on OpenSkywalking:master**.
@ascrutae 这个还需要实现更深一层……你悲剧了……
@wendal 你可以参考下这个PR：#553。可以同witness class（特定大版本中才有的类）来判断版本号。
目前确实是这样，因为目前没有动态改变的渠道，比如服务端推送，或者监测配置文件变化。
@neeuq 我们会调整一下实现。因为没做一层，就增加代码量和调试复杂度，本来不想这么做的。

能理解，完全不知道接口的底层实现类可能在干什么，感觉用(new SWPreparedStatement)这种代理的方法有点危险。

是准备要怎么修改，直接对com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement和com.mysql.cj.jdbc.PreparedStatement做增强，并拦截指定的方法？
我目前是通过System.setProperty("skywalking.logging.dir", dir)来设置日志目录了，但是日志不是产生在这个目录上，而是在AGENT_PACKAGE_PATH里面
那这个可能因为现在的初始化顺序的原因，造成这个初始化失效了，应该是个BUG。你可以尝试修复一下。我刚刚review了一下代码，应该无论通过哪种方式，复写`logging.dir`都会失败。
目前我没有想到特别好的修复办法，因为如果强制让此属性生效，实际会在两个地方生成日志文件。除非让日志模块和初始化模块紧耦合。

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13938471/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13938471)

Coverage increased (+0.3%) to 17.963% when pulling **54271df274e1718d3598224ec30b04bb6198c7f5 on ascrutae:feature/support-spring3-plugin** into **4a9626fff4a146eb873decf30b183288dea91e17 on OpenSkywalking:master**.

这个pull request先close了, 原因是:

线上部署发现, 现有的nutz mvc plugin没有完美捕捉真正的http status状态, 因为入口方法执行完成后, 还存在getStatus()返回值变化的可能执行路径, 例如在渲染页面的时候抛异常

我需要重新找一个入口(估计是ActionInvoker)来实现nutz mvc plugin
好的。你可以完成后更新nutz插件。
嗯嗯, 到时候一起pull req

引入一个变量怎么样，标识下参数是否已初始化完毕，System.getProperty中的参数处理完才置为true。
具体写日志就先根据这个变更判断是写到控制台还是文件中。

Yes, this API only works for jar file, for now. Do you have any suggestion? As you known, in IDE, the classes and resources files in separated folders, if you want to make sure this API works, it is totally a different logic.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13945181/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13945181)

Coverage increased (+0.3%) to 17.965% when pulling **eac522ed81299e21ac2d3b7dde5ff4d1d0240590 on ascrutae:feature/support-spring3-plugin** into **4a9626fff4a146eb873decf30b183288dea91e17 on OpenSkywalking:master**.

你可以看一下这个`org.skywalking.apm.agent.core.jvm.memorypool.MemoryPoolProvider`和`org.skywalking.apm.agent.core.jvm.memorypool.MemoryPoolModule`，他是找收集器类型匹配，然后再找内存区。你看一下是哪一集不对。而且要看看在Java8和java7，是不是调整下监控性。目前，如果是CMS收集器，我取得是`Metaspace`的空间。

这是我在测试环境中打印出的java8 jvm各区的名称：
Code Cache
Metaspace
Compressed Class Space
PS Eden Space
PS Survivor Space
PS Old Gen

跟org.skywalking.apm.agent.core.jvm.memorypool.ParallelCollectorModule有点不太吻合，主要是
PS Perm Gen --> Compressed Class Space, 之前是不是没考虑各版本间名称有变化。
如果要兼容不同名称的情况，估计要一个更复杂的适配机制。
我们没有主动使用`assembly.xml`，请确认下，是否由于pom中的finalName引起。并提交pull request修复此问题。谢谢。

> 是准备要怎么修改，直接对com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement和com.mysql.cj.jdbc.PreparedStatement做增强，并拦截指定的方法？

@ascrutae 会使用字节码的方式修改这两个类，取代SW*这样的类型，保证类型匹配。SW*主要是想保持插件逻辑简单，可读性高，全部使用字节码，可读性下降很多。
